sentences.sContent: We shall not allow a new bourgeoisie to come into being.
sentences.sCn: 我们不能允许产生一个新的资产阶级。

sentences.sContent: The question of how the first stars evolved is so important because their formations and eventual explosions provided the seeds for subsequent stars to come into being.
sentences.sCn: 关于第一批恒星的形成问题非常重要，因为它们的形成乃至最终爆炸，为以后恒星的形成提供了种子。

sentences.sContent: A user may sense that money must come into being either automatically as a result of economic activity or as an outgrowth of some government operation.
sentences.sCn: 一个人或许会觉得，货币要么是通过经济活动自动产生，要么就是某些政府行为的结果。
